summary: Code is disabling all hotkeys by pressing the Control key.

details.comment: Code is disabling all hotkeys by pressing the Control key.
details.content:
import pyautogui
import pynput
# you simply deprecate all hotkeys.
keyboard_controller = pynput.keyboard.Controller()
keyboard_controller.press(pynput.keyboard.Key.ctrl)
pyautogui.typewrite('1')
keyboard_controller.release(pynput.keyboard.Key.ctrl)
